1.title: choose

11.content: Your name is Joe, you're sitting in your garden when you see a meteorite crash in front of you. The meteorite glows green and curiosity gets the best of you as you approach to investigate. You touch it only to find the green glow transfer to you, when it's over you feel like you could fall apart any second. suddenly your size changes to
11.title: always meteorites

115.content: you find your vision blurred as all the world spins upon you, when you wake up you find yourself in a jungle of titanic proportions. wandering around you estimate you're no bigger than 1 inch tall, but how can that be and if you stay like this trapped in your lawn. You realize you have to get to your house where you can survive better, so you head to your front door. The step into the door is low enough for you to pull yourself over, you approach the step....
115.title: on the lawn

1152.content: you reach for the step and almost reach it when you see it get further away you must be shrinking again
1152.title: almost there

11522.content: you see the step stretch until its more than 10 times bigger, you try to find another way when you notice you can climb to the top now that you are smaller it takes you a few minutes of failed tries to make it to the top. as you head to the crack under the door a gust of wind comes your way and you're blown right at.....
11522.title: just wind

115222.content: You're spinning out of control as the wind carries on, you watch your lawn from above the chair you were in with the glass of juice and the small fountain in your garden. Suddenly the wind stops and you fall to your doom only to find a pool as your savior you are in the...
115222.title: wet landing

1152222.content: You wonder where you are as you try to stay on surface, the water is orange and you realize you landed in your juice. You feel better now that you survived but the juice is cold and the glass is to high to climb if you don’t do something you will die As a bug drowned in a simple glass. Time passes as you look into the street, all the people that walk by and no one will help you, you are about to fall unconscious when...
1152222.title: juicy landing

11522221.content: At your newly gained height you manage to escape your doom, tired and cold you lay on the table trying to regain strength to move on. Time passes and as the sun warms you the journey must continue, you climb down a leg and soon you’re in the jungle of your lawn once more. You have to hurry because you never know when the next change will happen
11522221.title: lawn again

choices: something finds you on your way out
115222212.content: You reach your door with relative ease but now you can’t get in, ironically you’re too big to fit under. You try to find another way in but every window is shut and way to far to even try to reach them, you wander waiting for the next change if such happens and after a few hours you decide is time to find help and you begin to head outside
115222212.title: stuck outside

1152222122.content: You shrink to half an inch tall and you quickly head up to the door, you easily pass under it to find yourself in a new jungle; your rug. The strings are huge and you have trouble finding your way, you could run in circles for hours and even if you could navigate the place you don’t know where to go, so you sit down to meditate where to go. You decide to try the kitchen but as you get up you feel yourself shrinking again as the tree like strings grow to skyscrapers size, you must be no bigger than 1/64 of an inch, with that in mind should you still try to get to your kitchen or wait until you hopefully get bigger...
1152222122.title: microscopic

11522221221.content:
You start to walk in the direction you think is the kitchen, your surroundings are dust specks 5 times bigger than you and you can see mites as big as you, triying not to move whenever you see one, you realize they don't identify you as something interesting or tasty.
With a bit of relief, by looking at the mites you take a minute to ponder just how small you are, you try to imagine yourself compared to normal objects but it’s too difficult as you continue on you see a gigantic rock ahead.
11522221221.title: giant rock

115222212212.content: the boulder is as big as you it's white and looks quite familiar you investigate it to find that it's just a grain of salt, how more humiliating can this get. You start to move again when the world looks smaller, you're finally growing maybe this time you'll end up big enough to do something. You wait until the growing stops and find you are...
115222212212.title: almost human again

1152222122122.content: Your head is finally above the rug fabric and you can clearly see the kitchen, you make haste but soon find the road is quite longer than you expected and have to loosen the rhythm. You are near the kitchen after a good 20 minutes, fearing that you could shrink any minute you try to run but your legs aren’t responding well, besides shrinking should not be your biggest fear.
1152222122122.title: to the kitchen

11522221221221.content: You make it to the kitchen and try to find something to eat but sadly your kitchen is very clean, so you have to figure out where should you climb to get some food. You look all your possible paths, you find that there are two ways up: one is climbing to the sink and walk to the counter from there, the other one is looking in the pantry but you don’t see a clear way in. You make up your mind you’re going...
11522221221221.title: paths

115222212212212.content: You go for the pantry because it’s guarantied you’ll get food there, as you approach you realize there’s no obvious way in, you try bordering it and still not even a tiny hole for a 1 inch person you think that maybe being smaller could help you right now but you can’t take chances. You realize that your only hope is to force the door, task that seems monumental so you have to find a really good lever to get it open
115222212212212.title: making your way in

1152222122122122.content: You’re once again smaller than an inch this coming and going is really beginning to drive you crazy, as you approach the door once again to see if you are small enough to fit you realize you haven’t stopped shrinking. You rush to the door and you find yourself already small enough but you have to climb on the pantry floor before the step gets to high for you....
1152222122122122.title: get in now

11522221221221221.content: You’re stuck again in the middle of your kitchen too small to do a thing, you’re about 1/64 of an inch and really tired so you rest against the pantry waiting for a better size. You doze off and after a few hours you wake still at the same size, but morning brings in a new danger: your maid. You hear gigantic footsteps and you realize it must be her, she’s coming to the kitchen and you hope she is about to make breakfast, maybe you can finally eat something As she enters you view you can see her ready to do some work, she is going to...
11522221221221221.title: enter the maid

115222212212212211.content: You see your maid reach for the broom and your world breaks down as you realize that you’re to small to even be a bug, there’s no way she’ll see you and save you from the garbage bin. As she makes her way to your position you realize it’s pointless to run and maybe with a little luck you wont be swept away
115222212212212211.title: sweeping

1152222122122122111.content:
You witness as the broom comes inches from you, witch from your perspective is really far away, you press yourself to the pantry and hope the broom doesn’t get you. As the broom approaches you close your eyes in fear and wait, a massive gust hits you but luckily it wasn’t strong enough to lift you up. You open your eyes and see that your maid is already sweeping long past your position, as she finishes she comes your way again heading to the living room you rush to her trying to get to her feet but you aren’t half way there when she already left the kitchen. You finally realize that your helpless, you can’t possibly do a thing at your puny 1/64 of an inch you sit there depressed waiting for something to happen since you can’t make it yourself.
As you try to regain your will you spot an ant about 10 inches from you, perfect you think just what you needed you consider to run but maybe it will only get her attention and probably it can run faster than you, on the other hand if you stay there it can spot you anyway and your fate would be the same. You have about the same chances with each course of action and every lost second makes you stick more to your second option, finally you make your decision...
1152222122122122111.title: from broom to ant

11522221221221221111.content: Now all you have to do is walk away from it keeping an eye on the ant and stop every time it looks your way, you stretch the 10 inches to 11 then 12 then 14 and you notice the ant is heading the other way, you calm down and rest again. This “victory” has boosted your morale and you regain hope that you can make it through this as you get up again you see the ant once again but this time it is a lot tinier, you grew without noticing and you estimate you are about 4 inches high. You think that you can shrink again anytime so just for precaution you kill the ant, then your thoughts bring you to your maid, this time you can get her attention. You rush to the living room and find her just about to leave, maybe she won’t come back until tomorrow... if she comes back, you scream as loud as you can to get her attention as she is about to close the front door, you find your efforts...
11522221221221221111.title: both getting away

115222212212212211112.content:
As the maid closes the door your morale shrinks again, the only good thing is that you didn't shrink with it.
You remember the pantry and rush to it again, this time you can open the pantry and finally access to the long wanted food. After stuffing yourself you realize that the pantry is a good place to live until you return to normal or someone helps you.
You make an improvised bed and check all the expiration dates for your food, if worst comes to worst to can live a year and a half on your more resilient food.
After making yourself comfortable you take a nap. You wake up to find....
115222212212212211112.title: Alone again

choices: Get in and forget about getting help
1152222122122122111122.content:
As you wake up you suddenly realize that you were in a very small room, you almost hit your head on the "ceiling".
As you come back to your senses you remember your current situation and soon find that you have grown, and quite a bit too, you realize that you are two feet tall.
Finally a size that you can be easily seen. You get out of the pantry remembering to let it a bit open just in case. You head to your front door and pile some books in a low shelf to open it. You stare for a few minutes at the outside, should you try to find help, thing that could go horribly wrong or just get used to the fact that you'll have to live with being gnat sized in a moment's notice.
1152222122122122111122.title: Standing in the doorway

choices: you're so small you can't even put a number to it
11522221221221221111222.content:
You stand there in your doorway trying your best to go out and seek help, some people are passing looking at you, dismissing you as a baby that can't quite walk by himself.
Your mind races as you start thinking about all the bad things that could happen, what if you went to a total stranger and he or she was a psycho, well you wouldn't you'd try with a friend, but what if you shrunk in the middle of the street, or just above a street drain or a stray dog got you. After pondering you thought about going to the police or a hospital, but that would be a stranger all over again, what could anyone do if you went mite sized again and couldn't figure out on time. Are you even curable, are you contagious, some many things could go wrong.
After a good ten minutes of standing there stressing, you couldn't bare it anymore and simply shut the door and stepped back in. Not a minute too soon as you felt yourself shrinking again, back to the rug jungle you said to no one...
11522221221221221111222.title: All hope is lost

115222212212212211112221.content:
Going back to the pantry, you start to finally feel as small as you currently are, thinking about the last few days all the close calls and the changes, the idea of living like this starts to freak you out, on top of that food won't last forever and hunting anything else might prove too dangerous.

As time passes you've found yourself going back and forth, sometimes smaller than an inch, others you reach 16 inches, never again you've reached 2 feet, but also never smaller than 1/4 of an inch. Your life starts to have some sort of routine, you never saw your maid again, and you never found the courage to try to contact anyone when you were tall enough to use the phone.

How long until something out of the ordinary happens?
115222212212212211112221.title: Just living shrunken life

11522221221222.content: You halt as a gigantic foot comes crashing near you, it can only be one of two person but as you look up you can’t see above the boobs of the giantess and the jeans she is wearing make impossible to distinguish who is it...
11522221221222.title: towering girl

11522221222.content: You decide to wait and stay perfectly still, waiting for you to grow bigger. Do you grow bigger?
11522221222.title: wait

115222212222.content: You see the world around you grow even smaller. Now the skyscraper sized objects grew, making you feel like you shrunk to almost an inch tall in that world. But in reality, you were even smaller. You were barely an 1/8 of a millimeter tall. Things were looking grim.
115222212222.title: Shrink

choices: Give up hope and hope you taste good
11522222.content: At that instant a shadow falls over the cup, and you look up to find that Anna, one of the girls in school you've had a crush on for a while, is looking right down at you. It takes you a moment to realize that in truth she's not looking at you, but at the cup of juice, which she picks up and brings to her lips. You've always dreamed of meeting those luscious, ruby red lips, but not like this and begin to scream her name as you swim through the juice. The flow is strong though, and it looks like you may not make it. At the instant you are about to pass into her mouth you.
11522222.title: Refreshing Drink

12.content: Your name is Kate. One day you're at the office carrying some documents to your boss when you notice a corridor you've never seen. At the end of the corridor there's a water tank, you realize you're thirsty and take a sip, satisfied you take the documents again and think that they weight different you look around and realize the room is changing you end up
12.title: misterious water tank

121.content:
Kate was just a non-descript young woman who was working as an auditing accountant in her company's office in Saigon, Viet Nam. The building was small and old but basically clean. She was walking down the hallway, carrying documents to be filed, when she noticed a corridor branching off to the right that she had never noticed before. The corridor was void of features except for a water cooler. Kate suddenly found herself irresistablely thirsty. She dropped the folders and rushed to the water cooler, hurriedly drinking down three paper cups of water. She then walked back to her folders and, picking them up from the floor, walked down the hallway, thinking to herself, "That was weird."
She suddenly felt a funny feeling come over her and in a flash, instantly transformed to a fifteen foot giantess.
Sadly, the ceiling was only eight feet high.
Which meant that when Kate transformed, her midsection merged with the ceiling.
Newton's law is fairly specific that two objects cannot exist in the same space at the same time. Reality corrected this oversight on the part of Kate and the ceiling by dispersing their atoms.
The resulting explosion had the force of an atomic bomb, destroying Kate, the building she worked in, and the surrounding neighborhoods.
International investigators combed the area, but no evidence of the type of nuclear device used was ever found, and no one ever took credit for it. However, the international community took notice of the situation and decided that certain countries should probably not have nuclear weapons. These countries gave them up when nicely asked, or had them forcibly removed when they didn't respond properly to politeness.
121.title: Newtonian physics in practice

124.content:
Kate was, in a single word, a bombshell. With long blonde hair that hung down to her waist and crystal blue eyes, she was one of the few women who could say that Barbie did not promote unrealistic standards of feminine beauty, at least not where her own looks were concerned. And as hot as those looks were, her demeanor was equally cold. At 24, she possessed an MBA and ran the company's accounts receivable department as her own little fiefdom, but an efficient fiefdom that was very profitable for her company. She planned to make vice president before she turned 30 and there was no one in the company who doubted she wouldn't do just that.
It was late on a Friday evening. The rest of the building had already gone home, and the cleaning staff wouldn't be there until early Saturday morning. Kate was heading to the copier room when she stopped cold in her tracks. She was looking down a corridor that didn't exist. Couldn't exist. She knew this building like the back of her hand and there simple wasn't a corridor here.
Except there was.
The corridor was void of windows, door, everything. Except a water cooler, with a paper cup dispenser attached to it.
And suddenly, Kate realized she was thirst. Incredibly thirsty. Without a second thought, she dropped the papers in her hand to her floor and rushed toward the water cooler. She gulped down four paper cups worth of water before stepping back, bewildered. She never acted in such an impulsive manner. Never.
Inching away from the water cooler, she left the corridor, picked up the papers she had dropped, and hurried back toward the copying machine. The first thing she was going to do was get a copy of the blue prints for this building. One minute later the corridor had disappeared from her memory and reality. Two minutes later she shrank.
There was no warning, no dizziness, no anything. One minute she was 5'7", the next she was a foot even.
There wasn't even much confusion. Kate found herself looking at a pile of blue cloth surrounding her, and realize that was her blouse. Her hair had come undone, cascading down her back and over and between her breasts. Her bare breasts!
Kate realized she was standing one foot tall in a pile of her clothes completely naked to the world. Just then she heard...
124.title: C.P.A. Barbie

1241.content:
Kate cowered in her pile of clothes.
"Who...who's there?"
The voice seemed to come from the middle of the air. "Ah, poor Kate, sweet Kate, dear Kate with the incredible pair of jabungos. You've spent too much time in the cerebral and not enough in the sensual. Well, we shall have to remedy that."
All of Kate's clothes simply vanished, leaving Kate exposed. She shrieked and threw her arms over breast and crotch.
"Now Kate, I fear this is the last I'll see of you," the disembodied voice continued, "So I must take my leave. Adieu, adieu, farewell, goodbye."
The voice disappeared leaving Kate...
1241.title: The laugh that wasn't there

choices: Kate decides staying hidden is the best plan right now.
1242.content: Kate ducked into her pile of clothes and looked over the edge. Walking down the empty corridor she could see Frank Johnson's 12 year old son, 'Mac'. What the hell was the kid doing here? Frank Johnson was a senior VP and by Friday noon he was already hauling his entire clan up to their beach house.
1242.title: Unexpected visitor

12422.content:
Kate dashed behind the copier and watch the giant kid. He was looking around in the room. Kate felt herself stop shrinking around 8 inches. Just then a little girl came into the room. She was Frank Johnsons's 4 year old daughter, Clare.
"Is it in here Mac?" the little girl's booming voice called.
"I'm still looking. I- wait." Mac said.
He reached up on a desk and pulled down a Barbie doll. The little girl giggled and grabbed her doll.
"Thanks Mac!" She said.
"Now come on, mom and dad are waiting for us in the car. We gotta get to the beach soon." Mac said as she left the room.
The little girl turned to leave...
12422.title: The kids

choices: A female co-worker coming in to use the copier.
124221.content: Kate breathed a sigh of relief once the two kids left. She came too close to becoming a little girl's doll. Just then she realized that if the girl caught her, it wouldn't have been that bad of an idea. She would have a chance to get to her boss and figure out how to get back to normal... that is, if the problem was from the building. Kate ran out the door when she ran into...
124221.title: Needs some help

choices: Kate grows in front of Clare's eyes
Clare puts Kate with her other Barbie things.
1242211.content:
Kate froze as she saw the giant 4-year-old. She had her back turned to her as she picked up some her stuff she dropped. Kate saw this as a perfect opportunity. Quickly, she put on some dropped Barbie clothes. Not being picky, she put on a pair of jeans and a pink t-shirt. It was itchy, but she didn't care. She laid down on the floor and froze her body in a doll pose, including that smile. Clare turned around. Kate held still and fought every urge to get up and run. Clare picked up Kate around the waist and brought her to her face.
“Wow, what a cool Barbie!” Clare said.
When she was done picking up her things, she went out to the car with Mac. Clare was strapped into her child safety seat, holding on to Kate the whole time. Besides Clare and Mac, Kate’s boss, his wife and Clare and Mac’s 16 year old sister were in the car.
1242211.title: Gone with Clare

12422111.content: Will she grow allot or a little?
12422111.title: Kate grows in front of Clare's eyes

124221112.content:
Kate grew but only slightly so slightly even though she was looking right at her Clare didn't notice eventually they come to a house. "Now Clare sweetie are you sure you don't want to come with us to the beach" Clare's mother asked her. "Yes mommy I am sure I don't like all that icky sand it makes my feet itchy" said Clare. "OK sweetie be a good girl for the babysitter" said Clare's mother. "I will mommy bye" said Clare as she got out of the car.

Once inside Clare waved good bye to her her family from a window and happily skipped to her room Kate still wrapped in her fingers. "Here we are welcome to your new home dolly" said Clare as she opened a pink door with stickers of rainbows and unicorns.

Once inside the room Kate looked around and got an immediate picture of what she would have to endure. The room walls were pink was the carpeting hanging from celling were plastic butterflies varying in color a medium sized bed (with Barbie sheets) lay in one corner in another there was a large dollhouse and a toy box and in the center there was a small table with a toy tea set on it.

"Now lets play __________" said Clare.
124221112.title: a little

choices: Mac dumps the contents of his duffle bag, including Kate, on his bed
Mac tosses his duffle bag unopened on his bed
12422112.content:
As Clare was putting away her "doll" Kate, Mac casually looked over. "Hey, Sis, that's a new doll, isn't it?" Clare nodded solemnly. "Mind if I take a look at it. Promise not to hurt it."
Clare frowned. "Well, OK." Mac gingerly held Kate while she remained perfectly frozen. Mac ran her hair through his fingers. "Wow, this feels almost real! Mom and Dad must have put out big bucks for this." Clare gave a triumphant smile at this assurance of her parent's general approval of her, then began playing with another doll. Mac fingered Kate's hair for a few more second and then, becoming bored, tossed her onto the floorboard. Fortunately for Kate, she landed inside a duffle bag full of clothes. She stealthily made her way to the bottom of the bag, hoping that by remaining out of sight, she wouldn't suffer from renewed interest from either Mac or Clare.
She had just made it to the bottom of the bag when she froze in fear: the duffle bag was being zipped closed! She felt the car coming to a stop and then felt the bag (and her inside it!) being lifted. She heard voices, but buried under the clothes, wasn't able to decipher what they were saying. Worse of all she felt the shrinking coming back, soon enough she was 3 inches tall and naked again.
"Well, Mac, you looking forward to spending another weekend at the lighthouse with Tim!"
"Yes sir!"
Mac's Dad smiled. Six years ago, he had bought a beach house just as another family bought the one next to it. Both families had sons of the same age. The sons had taken an instant liking to each other. The first year they even dragged out a dryer box between their two houses and dubbed it "The lighthouse".
Tim's Dad was an award winning architect, while Mac's Dad had started life as a civil engineer before moving up the ranks of managment. The two conspired to build the boys a one room clubhouse between the two houses. Each year it became more elaborate, until a miniature light house (still one story, the lighthouse portion was strictly a prop) stood between the two. It had electricity, running water, inside plumbing, a mini-fridge and microwave, plus a tv and an Xbox.
Last year, the boys declared their independence, wanting to camp out at the lighthouse undisturbed (except going to either one beach house or the other for meals or when a storm was gathering in.) Since the boys were in easy sight of either beach house when they played outside and they both carried cellphones which their occasionally overprotective mothers could call them on, the demand was acquiesed to and the lighthouse boys had their independence.
Mac was walking to the lighthouse and saw Tim already there. He grinned and waved and Tim grinned right back. Boy this was going to be a great weekend, Mac thought. Not a cloud in the sky and no clouds all weekend long. Little did he know he was carring a six-inch naked woman in his duffle bag. Little did Kate know she would be spending the weekend alone with two eleven year olds.
12422112.title: The Lighthouse

choices: Tom, the twelve year old kid brother of a worker on the cleaning crew
Nick, a 19 year old member of the cleaning crew
1242212.content:
Kate ducked under the copier in time to remain undetected by her co-worker. As she kneeled there, she felt dizzy again and could tell she had shrunk (down to six inches). Damn it, she thought, she couldn't afford the shrink anymore!
She waited for her co-worker to leave and wondered what the hell she was doing her on a Friday evening. Then as her coworker left, she recognized the woman. Ms. Deckins. She was notorious for coming in after hours and helping herself to office supplies, free use of the copier, etc., for personal use. She was also the president's executive secretary for the last 20 years and completely untouchable. As she crawled out from underneath the copier, she found herself scooped up by someone she hadn't seen come in. It was...
1242212.title: Office coffee

124222.content:
Kate internally groaned as she saw Mac's little sister Clare join her brother. She felt a little dizzy spell and noticed she had shrunk again (from 12 inches to 8 inches). Damn it, this has got to stop before I shrink down to nothing. Her earlier question about what the kids were doing here was quickly answered? Mac was helping his little sister find a prized Barbie doll. Well, the whole company knew Frank overindulged his two kids. Obviously he would even put the family weekend trip on hold so that his 4 year old daughter could find her favorite doll. There was another shimmer and she felt herself shrink again (down to 6 inches). Lord, make this stop she groaned internally.
Then her blood froze. 4 year old Clare pointed to the pile of clothes she was hiding in and said, "What's that?"
Mac turned around and his eyes went wide open. He turned to his sister, "Nothing, somebody just left their laundry here. Listen, why don't you go down to the car and I'll be there in a minute."
"Why aren't you coming down with me, Mac?"
"I just won't to make sure you didn't leave any other Barbie stuff up here."
Clare smiled. "Thanks, Mac, you're the best!"
As soon as Clare left, Mac started looking around furiously. He had heard his dad and other guys talk about sex in the storage room, and he thought that meant he might be able to catch someone actually doing it. After a few minutes he gave up, knowing if he wasn't downstairs soon, his dad would come looking for him immediately. He decided to go through the clothes real quick to see if he could find anything. As soon as he did, he saw a six-inch beautiful little woman staring straight back up at him. And she was naked!
Knowing he had to do something fast, Mac grabbed her and stuffer her six-inch body inside his shirt. However he didn't count on her....
124222.title: Discovered!

choices: Try to get the young boy's attention
125.content:
The empty corridors were filled with the echo of click, click, click of high heels as Kate carried to the last load of the day. Mr. Bosworth would be gone for the weekend, but the files still needed to be put on his desk as soon as Kate got them.
This didn't bother Kate at all. She was actually a attractive, shapely young woman, but her strict attire, no nonsense personality and hair always in a bun added fifteen years to her projected persona. A persona she very carefully maintained as Mr. Bosworth's executive administrative assistant.
As Kate hurried down the hallway, she passed a corridor that she had never seen. That she knew wasn't there.
Except it was there.
The corridor had no doors, no windows. Just an aging water cooler.
Suddenly Kate found herself remarkably thirst. With a quick look to make sure no one was watching, she entered the mystery corridor and found a stack of paper cones hanging to one side of the cooler. She greedily drank down three cones of water before leaving the corridor.
As she walked hurriedly back toward Mr. Bosworth's office, the corridor that wasn't there before wasn't there again.
Suddenly, she felt a dizzy situation, and felt her glasses fall off her nose. When she opened her eyes, she was this thick cloth surrounding her. Suddenly, strangely, she immediately knew what that cloth was.
It was her own clothes. She had shrunk out of them. (Unknown to Kate at the moment, she had shrunk to six inches). Her glasses looked monstrously huge before her, but they were reading glasses only, and her vision was basically unimpaired.
The pins in her had also not shrunk, and as result, her long dark hair hung down to the small of her back and between her firm but ample breasts.
Kate really didn't know what to do. All of the personnel had left for the weekend and the cleaning crew wouldn't be here for hours. And in her present state, she didn't know if she wanted to be discovered right away.
Just then, she heard the echo of footsteps in the hallway. Ducking back into the pile of her clothes, she saw a 12 year old boy enter the hallway unescorted. He took a turn away from her and headed toward the elevator.
Kate decided she should...
125.title: I saw a corridor that wasn't there

choices: Kate decides to try to hunt down the water cooler.
Kate hears foot steps coming down the hallway and dives back into the pile of cl
1252.content:
All things considered, Kate decided the wisest thing to do was to let the kid leave without noticing her. Especially since she was for all practical reasons running around in the buff.
The young boy entered the elevator and disappeared. Must be an executive's kid picking up something from Mom or Dad, she decided.
As soon as the kid was gone, Kate climbed out of her clothes and took stock of her condition. It must have been that mysterious water cooler that did this, she thought. Maybe there's someway to reverse this.
1252.title: Source of the Nile

choices: Try to get the young boy's attention
Wait for him to go away
12522.content:
Again, Kate hears the echoing sound of approaching footsteps and dives back into the pile of her 'gigantic' clothes. It's that 12 year old kid again. He seemed to have a slightly perplexed look on his face, not worried or scared, but as if he had just put something down and couldn't remember where had put it. A part of Kate's mind said that this was a sign and she should try to flag the kid down. The other part said just let the kid go and work it out on her own.
Kate decides to---
12522.title: The comeback kid

125222.content:
All things considered, Kate decides the wiser course of action is not to reveal to this kid, whoever he is, that there is a naked six inch woman running around.
As soon as she is sure the kid is gone, she climbs back out of her clothes and starts scurrying back to where the corridor with the water cooler was.
Except it's not there. She looks up and down the hallway and absolutely no sign of it.
At this point the sound of approaching footsteps can be heard. Kate looks around and finds she has absolutely no where to hide. The pile of her clothes is out of sight now. As the footsteps get closer, she...
125222.title: Caught in the open!

choices: Kate grew to double her size but still shrunken
Kate grew to normal size for now but had to worry about being in the nude
uh oh Kate was growing big... Too big the hallway was getting extremely cramped
1252221.content:
As the footsteps draw closer she begins to feel strange.

Something started to seem off then Kate realized she was starting to grow this time.
1252221.title: Grows

12522211.content:
For a second Kate felt the nightmare was over, whatever she had was just temporary. As she rose up for what felt as minutes, she suddenly stopped, feeling dizzy as if an elevator made an emergency stop, it took her a moment to realize she still wasn't quite full size.

Saddened, by this turn of events, standing about what she guessed one foot tall, she was trying to find something to compare to, other than the walls and ceiling. As she saw around she pondered if she as going to grow back bit by bit, yeah that is surely what will happen, she thought in a bit of a delusional state.

As she turned around still trying to find out her current size she remembered that someone was coming, not only coming but that someone was already looking down at her...
12522211.title: Going up, barely

13.content: Your name is Alex. You're in the mall spending some time you don't know what to do with, you have looked every corner of the mall when you notice a shop that wasn't open the first time you passed. It's not even attending people but you are so bored that you don't care and get in, inside there are row and rows of egg like things you reach for one but you make it unbalance and it falls to the ground. The egg cracks and smoke comes out of it filling the whole room, when it dissipates you see everything off scale and changing every second, you end at
13.title: store cliché

131.content: You gasp. You're huge! All of your clothes have ripped off except your boxers, which somehow have survived, but look like a second skin on you. You glance down at the clerk, who you sort of checked out upon entering the store. He's staring at you with a raging boner in his pants. You grin and grab him. You order him to strip and he does, and you begin to get hard looking at his hard young body. He can't be more than 16 years old, and is very cute. You begin jerking off with him watching. He starts to as well. You moan as you feel yourself cumming, and the familiar tingling feeling overcomes you and you feel yourself start to grow even more! Your head pushes up against the ceiling. You feel your boxers rip apart as you grow. You are now completely naked. You stand up and view your surroundings as your growth comes to a stop. Judging from your perspective, you....
131.title: 40 Foot Sex

14.content: Your name is Rose. Today chemistry class took way longer for you than to the other students, the teacher had to go out for a few minutes and there you are all alone impatient to finish and go home. As you're about to make the final reaction the seismic alarm goes off and you in the back of the laboratory holding dangerous chemicals, you carefully leave the chemicals safe and rush to the door but it's too late and the earthquake starts. It's not a tiny one, about 8.2 enough to trash the laboratory and make you lie beneath rubble and soaked in chemicals you think you are trapped when a change makes your escape possible
14.title: earthquake + lab = trouble

choices: Wait for Miss Higgins to return
145.content:
The rubble is pinning you down, squeezing your chest and thus making it nearly impossible to breathe. You feel as if you are about to faint when you notice a strange tingling sensation in your stomach area quickly spreading through your entire body.

Drowsily, you wonder about this phenomenon for a moment before drifting off. This is when you notice that the weight of the debris is getting lighter. Surprised, you take in an unencumbered breath of air. Hope clears your mind and you come to your senses.

Figuring that someone must have helped you, you look around - and freeze. There is no one there. And the debris hasn't moved at all, it is still there, hovering above you. But it is huge now, as is the rest of the room. Oddly enough, your mind is incredibly clear and you have no problem accepting the fact that you can't be more than 12cm in height.

Getting up, you exit the rubble's shadow and get an overview over what is left of the lab. Everything is a total mess covered in chemicals and glass. You yourself are covered in a multi-colored mixture of chemicals. Putting things together, you figure that this is what caused you to shrink. Well, even if that is true, this doesn't help you figure out a way to return to normal. You aren't sure if your teacher Miss Higgins would be able to help you, since you never heard of anything like that except for in cheap movies.

Anyhow, you have to decide what to do next. The door to the lab is shut and the knob high above your reach. So, there is no way for you to leave there unto your own power. By an odd act of chance, some of the rubble has, however, piled up in front of the broken windows. You could climb up there and then exit. Fortunately, the lab is on the first floor and there are some bushes in front of the windows. Once outside, you could try to find someone who can help you. On the other hand, if you stay in the lab, Miss Higgins is bound to come and check on you (after all, she is already way overdue). She may be distraught at times, but she is your chemistry teacher and effectively responsible for you at the moment (what a weird way of thinking.).
145.title: In the devastated lab

1451.content:
Not knowing when Miss Higgins will return, you decide to take matters into your own hands, and climb out of the window. The cracked, broken glass is an obvious hazard to be aware of, as is the unstable rubble, so you take plenty of caution navigating everything. Extremely careful not to have the razor sharp broken glass slice through your thin skin like paper, you carefully climb through the cracked window and onto a ledge, where you can choose to head right, where there's a tree branch within your grasp, and a few people - both male and female - resting in the shade of the tree beneath it, or you can instead go left instead, where there's a relatively safe drop down to ground level via a large, shady table umbrella. Alternatively, you could try jumping for one of the students as they pass by, but that's a lot more risky. It will make it a lot easier to get one specific person's attention, however...

Which way do you go?
1451.title: Climb out the window

15.content: Your name is Matt. You are in your basement working on a device of your own invention a ray that makes the state of and object change without adding or stealing heat or pressure. The device as a problem the mass of the object tends to change for no apparent reason you thought it was mass loss but once the mass increased and you've been trying to find an answer. This is the 16th straight hour of work without rest and it's catching up with you, as you activate the device it falls of your hand and shoot at your direction, you scream in pain as the ray hits you and black out, when you're up you find yourself...
15.title: in your basement

info.brief_description: A constantly changing experience, you'll never know what will the next size be.
info.description:
the main character finds something that makes him or her change size without control and Randomly

rules

the main character must change size at most every 5 chapters
every change has to be at least half or double the current size
THIS RULE WILL BY ENFORCED BY EDITING AND DELETING IF NECESSARY

IF you include sex:
stick to the main character preferences
must include a shrunk person or a giant

you can add characters as you please and even make them change size but make sure you are following the storyline

have fun
